data.lyric:
[ti:Doin' Time]
[ar:Lana Del Rey]
[al:Doin' Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Doin' Time (Explicit) - Lana Del Rey (拉娜·德雷)
[00:02.12]Lyrics by：Bradley James Nowell/Rick Rubin/Adam Keefe Horovitz/Adam Nathaniel Yauch/Marshall Raymond Goodman/Ira Gershwin/DuBose Heyward/Dorothy Heyward/George Gershwin
[00:04.25]Composed by：Bradley James Nowell/Rick Rubin/Adam Keefe Horovitz/Adam Nathaniel Yauch/Marshall Raymond Goodman/Ira Gershwin/DuBose Heyward/Dorothy Heyward/George Gershwin
[00:06.38]Summertime and the livin's easy
[00:10.98]Bradley's on the microphone with Ras MG
[00:13.88]All people in the dance will agree
[00:16.28]That we're well-qualified to represent the L.B.C
[00:20.83]Me me and Louie we gonna run to the party
[00:24.55]And dance to the rhythm it gets harder
[00:30.83]Me and my girl we got this relationship
[00:37.32]I love her so bad but she treats me like s**t
[00:43.74]On lockdown like a penitentiary
[00:49.31]She spreads her lovin' all over
[00:51.13]And when she gets home there's none left for me
[00:56.10]Summertime and the livin's easy
[01:00.71]Bradley's on the microphone with Ras MG
[01:03.48]All people in the dance will agree
[01:05.96]That we're well-qualified to represent the L.B.C
[01:10.51]Me me and Louie we gonna run to the party
[01:14.31]And dance to the rhythm it gets harder
[01:18.20]Harder harder
[01:24.17]Oh take this veil from off my eyes
[01:30.80]My burning sun will some day rise
[01:35.97]So what am I gonna be doin' for a while
[01:38.66]Said I'm gonna play with myself
[01:42.80]Show them now we've come off the shelf
[01:48.94]Summertime and the livin's easy
[01:53.62]Bradley's on the microphone with Ras MG
[01:56.50]All people in the dance will agree
[01:58.87]That we're well-qualified to represent the L.B.C
[02:03.46]Me me and Louie we gonna run to the party
[02:07.25]And dance to the rhythm it gets harder
[02:10.98]Harder harder
[02:15.80]Evil I've come to tell you that she's evil most definitely
[02:22.50]Evil ornery scandalous and evil most definitely
[02:28.92]The tension it's getting hotter
[02:34.56]I'd like to hold her head underwater
[02:42.03]Summertime
[02:53.53]Ah ah ah
[02:55.25]Summertime and the livin's easy
[02:59.80]Bradley's on the microphone with Ras MG
[03:02.74]All people in the dance will agree
[03:05.11]That we're well-qualified to represent the L.B.C
[03:09.71]Me me and Louie we gonna run to the party
[03:13.46]And dance to the rhythm it gets harder
data.trans:
[ti:Doin' Time]
[ar:Lana Del Rey]
[al:Doin' Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.12]//
[00:04.25]//
[00:06.38]夏日生活 安逸简单
[00:10.98]Bradley Nowell和Marshall Goodman在歌唱
[00:13.88]所有跳舞的人都会赞成
[00:16.28]我们有资格代表长滩市
[00:20.83]我和Louie要去参加派对
[00:24.55]随着节拍跳舞 节奏愈发强烈
[00:30.83]我和她的爱情 很不公平
[00:37.32]我那么爱她 她却对我不屑一顾
[00:43.74]这段感情就像监狱 让人窒息
[00:49.31]她的爱播撒天下
[00:51.13]回到家时所剩无几 我得不到一丝怜悯
[00:56.10]夏日生活 安逸简单
[01:00.71]Bradley Nowell和Marshall Goodman在歌唱
[01:03.48]所有跳舞的人都会赞成
[01:05.96]我们有资格代表长滩市
[01:10.51]我和Louie要去参加派对
[01:14.31]随着节拍跳舞 节奏愈发强烈
[01:18.20]节奏愈发强烈
[01:24.17]摘去蒙蔽我双眼的纱
[01:30.80]我的烈日总有一天会升起
[01:35.97]那在此之前我该做什么
[01:38.66]我说 我要自娱自乐
[01:42.80]告诉他们 我们已经胜券在握
[01:48.94]夏日生活 安逸简单
[01:53.62]Bradley Nowell和Marshall Goodman在歌唱

[02:07.25]随着节拍跳舞 节奏愈发强烈
[02:10.98]节奏愈发强烈
[02:15.80]我十分肯定地告诉你 她很邪恶 
[02:22.50]邪恶 难缠 可耻 一定没错
[02:28.92]关系愈发紧张
[02:34.56]我想让她窒息而死
[02:42.03]夏日
